Hello, I'm Bobby Schade

I love building useful tools and am obsessive about building them well. I primarily build with JavaScript and the MERN stack but am enthusiastic about learning new technologies that improve development and the end product.

My work can be seen below as well as on my GitHub. I am eager to bring value to a collaborative team focused on producing excellent work and solving interesting, meaningful challenges.

Along with coding, I enjoy good music, television, and movies. I also love being active, particularly by playing tennis, basketball, golf, and ping-pong.

Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, Node, MongoDB, Mongoose, Bootstrap, Sass, Git
